attachments.title: Where Programming, Ops, AI, and the Cloud are Headed in 2021
attachments.text: Following O'Reilly online learning trends to see what's coming next.
attachments.fallback: O’Reilly Media: Where Programming, Ops, AI, and the Cloud are Headed in 2021

text:
Wow some of this is pretty surprising. Julia's usage has gone down over the last year? Everything I've seen coming from Julia computing says otherwise.

Rust had 94% growth? That's pretty intense, yes it has a small user base, but, it's a pretty active community(multiple discord servers, multiple discorses, zulip, etc, always going). Feels more active than Go to me...

Also what do they even mean by "DevOps" when they are comparing to to say Kubernetes? Kubernetes to many people falls under DevOps...

text: I think they refer to usage of julia on their platform, which is probably a quite limited application?

text:
yea considering I have never heard of ORielly platforms other than books... seems like a bad study design...
ahhhh "Following O'Reilly *online learning trends* to see what's coming next."
